help.title: Customer Management
help.information: A Reseller (resp. Administrator) assigns any desired sites to a Customer. These sites then can be administrated by the Customer. Here, he has to keep to the limitations given by the Reseller (resp. Administrator). He may apply - according to the limits - any desired users or aliases and also manage them. In contrast to the Reseller, he cannot gain access to the users or aliases belonging to another Customer of course.

section.head: Customer Name
section.description: This is the Name of the Customer as it is e.g. shown in the Event-Log.

section.head: Customer Password
section.description: In conjunction with the Name and this Password, the Customer can login to the XAMS GUI.

section.head: Account locked
section.description: Using this option, an Administrator or a Reseller can lock a Customer. Thereby he can't login the XAMS GUI anymore.

section.head: Reseller
section.description: Here, the Customer is assigned to a specific Reseller. Depending on the Reseller, the Site-selection changes to the pool that this Reseller administrates.

section.head: Sites
section.description: Here, a Administrator resp. a Reseller can assign one or several Sites to a Customer. But only the Sites that are available to the Reseller can be assigned to his Customer.
